
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define sc2(x,y) scanf("d",&x,&y);
#define pr(x) printf("%d \n",x);
#define scll(x) scanf("%lld",&x);
#define scll2(x,y) scanf("lld",&x,&y);
#define prll(x) printf("%lld \n",x);
#define ll long long
#define PII  pair<int,int>

using namespace std;


double dp[1000000+10];
int main()
{
    dp[0]=0.0;
    dp[1]=0.0;
    for(int i=2;i<1000000 +10;i++) dp[i]= 0.5*(dp[i-1]+dp[i-2])+1;
    int tc;
    scanf("%d",&tc);
    int n;
    while(tc--)
    {
        sc(n)
        printf("%.6f\n",dp[n]);
    }
}
